infotexts.entitydescription.ammopack: A case allowing easier ammunition management and transport.
infotexts.entitydescription.backpack1: A smaller and lighter version of the backpack assistants are able to make.
infotexts.entitydescription.ddossuit: A diving suit produced for high-risk deep diving operations in hazadous environments. With an integrated batter-powered propulsion system, storage system and a compact holder for storage containers.
infotexts.entitydescription.heavybackpack: Large backpack used to transport heavy tools or equipment more easily. Can be used to store large items like turret ammunition.
infotexts.entitydescription.heavycrate: A heavy, movable crate used to store turret turret ammunition and diving suits.
infotexts.entitydescription.medicalbackpack: Used by medical personnel to act independently of medbays by allowing them to transport medbays.
infotexts.entitydescription.medipack: A case easier medicine management and transport.
infotexts.entitydescription.oxy-genbackpack: A portable rebreathing station converted into a backpack allowing the user to breath underwater and refill oxygen tanks.
infotexts.entitydescription.power-backpack: A portable high-intensity light emitter equiped with charging docks and storage.
infotexts.entitydescription.shieldbackpack: A revolutionnary device used to reduce damage taken when powered depending on the battery type used. Use of alien power sources is not recommended by the original creator, but may be worth attempting...
infotexts.entitydescription.techno-backpack: Advanced gear, equipped with a portable status monitor, item finder and electrical monitor as well as a sonar and thermal scanner.
